page.title: 01RIVER MENALHYL:UPPER WATERS
page.content: {(MENA}means{Hills:HYL}means{Estuary) This area of land slopes gently to the south and west.The shallow sided valleys and flat valley bottoms are covered with various shades of green. {Small fields}descend to the streams and river head waters and there is much wet land. Man has had a great impact on this landscape in the way he has created the fields and left a few copses of {older woodland.}The narrow steep sided lanes make it difficult for vehicles to pass and once off the Secondary roads it is vital to proceed carefully. Beef and dairy farms predominate. Even in{Tregonetha village}most home owners have some land.There is also a small{village green.}With no shops and only the school buses,people need their own form of transport.
